Quests.name: A new journey
Quests.shortDesc: Welcome to Arngor, traveler. Do you seek to enter our great kingdom? If so, please report for duty at the mayor's chamber.
Quests.longDesc: Entering Arngor is currently restricted to trusted people only. Destructive turmoil has rooted itself upon our great kingdom. We do not seek to increase this instability by feeding our enemies more allies. Prove yourself and you will be allowed safe passage. Our mayor can be found in the upper floor of the local inn - Rorin is his name.

Quests.name: Wolf Pelts
Quests.shortDesc: I really need some more leather scraps for my workshop. Care to help me out?
Quests.longDesc: I require 10 wolf pelts. Yeah, you heard right - Wolves. You'll find them outside the castle roaming the forest. Be careful- they're viciously hungry...

Quests.name: Report for duty
Quests.shortDesc: You seem like you're a capable fella. If you want to enter our kingdom, you'll have to earn your keep! Report for duty at the bridge, and find Commander Felix.
Quests.longDesc: I hope you aren't too rusty with weapons - you've got to get your hands dirty, son. Meet up with Felix at the bridge - he'll give you further instructions!

Quests.name: Explore the camp
Quests.shortDesc: I bet you're eager to start? As you can see, we've set up a perimeter here. A bunch of smugglers have overrun this part of the island, and we don't have enough soldiers stationed here. You'll have to go check it out for us.
Quests.longDesc: This right here is a product of the growing turmoil in our kingdom. These smugglers are mining the excavation point. The cave can supply them with everything from weapons to magical artifacts, which is just what the enemy wants. This has to end - they're bringing the enemy closer to our very doorstep...

Quests.name: Strike the camp
Quests.shortDesc: Awful, just awful... We have to free the slaves, but first we need to lower the number of mercenaries. Kill a few of the scumbags.
Quests.longDesc: Slay 10 smugglers. Watch out for their commanding officers - they may be too strong for you.

Quests.name: Liberate the slaves
Quests.shortDesc: Great work so far! Now it is time for you to liberate the slaves. Time is of the essence!
Quests.longDesc: Rescue 5 slaves, and bring them back home safely!

Quests.name: A final assault
Quests.shortDesc: It's time, young traveler. Your greatest challenge lies before you. Gather some friends and take on the commanding officers. Crush the smugglers once and for all!
Quests.longDesc: Neutralize the three commanding officers. One is located at the main camp, another is located in the cave, and the last one can be found in the building just at the right from the bridge.

Quests.name: A new allegiance
Quests.shortDesc: Outstanding, the smugglers have finally been crushed! Report back to Rorin, he will be most pleased.
Quests.longDesc: Rorin will reward you for your great bravery, traveler. Choose wisely! Best of luck, tread safely.

Quests.name: Food supplies
Quests.shortDesc: Howdy stranger! Mind helping me out? I'm in dire need of certain supplies. I know that those damn smugglers have lots of supplies. Care to fetch me some?
Quests.longDesc: Fetch 6 supply bags from the smuggler camp and surrounding areas. Be careful - the smugglers will not be happy!

Quests.name: Wolf meat
Quests.shortDesc: These damn wolves are everywhere! I need them gone - my farm is getting attacked regularly by those beasts. Slay some and fetch me their meat!
Quests.longDesc: Fetch 10 pieces of wolf meat. The wolves can be found all over the island.

Quests.name: Potion Brewing
Quests.shortDesc: Greetings traveler. Would you mind helping us out? We need certain ingredients to brew important potions.
Quests.longDesc: The Chantry appreciates your help. Please fetch 5 pumpkins and 3 mushrooms. You can find these items in the forest. Watch out for the wolves, though. May the lord watch over you.

Quests.name: Regular Assault
Quests.shortDesc: Felix told me you're good at getting your hands dirty. Unfortunately, the smugglers haven't abandoned the site just yet. We'll have to press harder and more regularly. Up for some action?
Quests.longDesc: Kill some smugglers and obtain their secret battle plans. The more we interfere, the greater the chance will be for us to put an end to them!

Quests.name: Logan's Secret
Quests.shortDesc: Please, would you mind fetching some personal belongings of mine? An important book is located in my room, in a house occupied by the smugglers.
Quests.longDesc: Go to the smuggler's camp, enter the building, and fetch my book in the room to the left.

Quests.name: Wolves at the gate I
Quests.shortDesc: Hello, traveler! These darn wolves keep coming out to the gate - would you mind taking care of them?
Quests.longDesc: Slay 10 young wolves. You can find wolves all around the island, although some are more dangerous than others.

Quests.name: Aron's Box
Quests.shortDesc: I have something important left behind at the building over at the smuggler's camp. Would you mind fetching a pristine box from my room?
Quests.longDesc: You can find the box in my room, at the right. Watch out for the smugglers - they aren't very fond of strangers...

Quests.name: Smuggler's Might
Quests.shortDesc: Hello again, traveler. Your services have been most useful! Yet, there is more to be done. A powerful legionnaire has arrived. Bring some friends and face this new foe! The smugglers shall be crushed once again.
Quests.longDesc: The smugglers are quite hesitant to deploy reinforcements. A legionnaire has been sent to scare us. We shall not tremble before these mercenaries. Bring some friends and face this new foe!

Quests.name: Foul Magic
Quests.shortDesc: Wretched creatures have infiltrated the catacombs. I dare you to fetch some bone fragments off of our dead.
Quests.longDesc: These bone fragments might come in handy. Perhaps we will be able to analyze the fragments in order to create an antidote against the foul magic used to turn our dead. Thirty fragments should be more than enough. However, fetching them won't be easy...

Quests.name: Saving Sergeant Harold
Quests.shortDesc: One of our sergeants have been missing for weeks. We suspect he might have been captured by the savages that reside in the catacombs.
Quests.longDesc: Sergeant Harold was sent to inspect the catacombs after months of suspicion that something had gone bad down there. Our priests didn't return when they should. Some of them were sick, and we couldn't risk letting them roam the outskirts freely so we threw them back into the catacombs for our own safety! We were desperate, you see, but now I fear things have escalated further... If you find Harold, be sure to rescue him at any cost!

objectives.objective: Escort Harold safely to the surface

Quests.name: Demonic Blood Samples
Quests.shortDesc: I believe we can make use of some blood samples off of the rats that reside in the catacombs. Would you care to help us out?
Quests.longDesc: The Chantry is interested in studying the blood vial of these vicious beasts. These are no ordinary rats. They have been cursed by the dark priestess, we're sure of it! Their blood could prove useful in our campaign against the dark forces that seek to destroy us. Fetch me a vial of any rat's blood, but while you're at it, neutralize all of them!

objectives.objective: Procure Vial of Demonic Rat Blood

Quests.name: The Evil Within
Quests.shortDesc: Young traveler, our greatest fear have come true! The island is no longer safe, our enemy has built an army right under our noses! We need you to neutralize this threat before it is too late!
Quests.longDesc: For years the Capital Outskirts have protected the lands of Arngor from invaders, pirates and such... But now, I fear this position will be lost if we don't deal with the intruders that reside in the now opened catacombs. You will have to bring some allies to defeat the evil within. May Lightfall be with you! Slay them all!

Quests.name: Moroes the Summoner
Quests.shortDesc: A great foe of the Chantry, he is apparently the master mind behind this unfortunate infiltration of our island. We need you to defeat Moroes and his commanders. Should you be successful, the dark priestess herself would be weakened! Are you up for the challenge?
Quests.longDesc: Moroes the Summoner, a powerful necromancer. Once an archmage of Lightfall itself. Treacherous thoughts plagued Moroes, and eventually he was recruited by the priestess herself. His knowledge of the dark arts has made him as feared as Keldroth himself. Slaying him won't be easy, but if you bring enough people you should be able to put him out of his misery.

Quests.name: Dangerous Supplies
Quests.shortDesc: We need your help to acquire further fragments from the catacombs! The Chantry wishes to study the materials further, and is in need of more supplies.
Quests.longDesc: The fragments you fetched for Rorin earlier has proven most useful, yet we are in need of more! We believe that these fragments may aid us in our battle against the dark priestess.  You see, with these fragments we can create armor and potions that will help us defeat the cursed creatures more effectively.

Quests.name: Wolves at the gate II
Quests.shortDesc: There's yet more to be done! These wolves are even more vicious, would you mind?
Quests.longDesc: Slay 10 more wolves, focus on the elder ones this time. They're much more aggressive, be careful.

Quests.name: Wolves at the gate III
Quests.shortDesc: I'm afraid I'll need your assitance with wolves yet again, would you be so kind?
Quests.longDesc: This time around I'll need even more assistance, the so called 'Magnificent' wolf brethren can be found at a few various locations around the island. Slay and fetch the pelt off of one!

Quests.name: A Restless Evil
Quests.shortDesc: Deep within the Outskirts Catacombs rests an evil within, this evil can only be summoned from a book lying near the altar.
Quests.longDesc: The infamous necromancer Moroes the Summoner brought with him an infestation of evil in the catacombs at the Capital Outskirts. Vanquishing Moroes and his commanders will not be enough. There is a book with magnificent magical power lying on an altar within the catacombs, read from it and you should summon its magical powers.

Quests.name: Securing the perimeter
Quests.shortDesc: We have to neutralize the countless bandits roaming the country side.
Quests.longDesc: Lots of bandits have settled outside the city, and the villagers are not liking it one bit! Regular riots are driving our resources thin, please defeat these mongrels for us.

Quests.name: Wolf Menace
Quests.shortDesc: Our cattle is at continuous risk due to these darn wolves, we need you to reduce their numbers.
Quests.longDesc: Wolves are very common in this region of the Kingdom, however their numbers are staggering high. Our animals are not safe, especially our cattle is at risk! The wolves are destroying our most vital sources of food. We do not want to lead our people to starvation!

Quests.name: Torch the Camp
Quests.shortDesc: Try to smoke out the bandits by burning down their tents, this should teach them a severe lesson. To stay out of our territory!
Quests.longDesc: Use a torch to fire up the various bandit tents stationed around Lightfall, just don't burn up anything inside the city though. That'd cost ya.

Quests.name: Spider Menace
Quests.shortDesc: The Lightfall caves were popular for mining, but unfortunately no more... A large infestation of spiders have prevented us from efficiently using the tunnels!
Quests.longDesc: A large infestation of spiders have been plaguing the city for a long time, few are willing to risk their lives mining for minnerals. We need these minnerals for our local blacksmith, otherwise how will we craft armor and weapons?

Quests.name: Bandit Massacre
Quests.shortDesc: The High King demands swift action, bandits are overrunning the region! Bring me their heads, show no mercy!
Quests.longDesc: Slaughter these bandits in the name of the king! Bring me their heads so we can put them on pikes for the others to see, we are not to be trifled with.

Quests.name: Bandit Supplies
Quests.shortDesc: Our local mining tunnels are overrun by spiders, so we have to get our crafting materials from the bandits. Fetch me some of their armor, weapons and what not.
Quests.longDesc: These bandits are significantly geared, as if they were blades for hire! We need more crafting materials, the local mining tunnel is not safe for labour at this time. Therefore we want you to obtain armor scraps from bandits that you may kill.

Quests.name: Bandit Intel
Quests.shortDesc: We want you to find out what these bandits are really up to. Who sent them? What are they doing here?
Quests.longDesc: Bandits have plagued Lightfall for quite some time now, we need to figure out why they are really here. Try to find some intel on them, they have two main camps, one near the entrance to Scorchridge and another deep in the nearby cave.

Quests.name: A New Dawn
Quests.shortDesc: We're happy to have you with us, your next journey awaits in Lightfall my friend. Bring this letter to the king.
Quests.longDesc: The High King has had plenty of trouble on his hands of late, extra hands to help out would be much appreciated. Speak to the boat master by the docks, he will take you to our great kingdom!

Quests.name: Supplies for Marcus Heinberg
Quests.shortDesc: Marcus Heinberg in Capital Outskirts is in need of some long awaited supplies, would you care to bring them to him?
Quests.longDesc: Marcus Heinberg is in need of some crafting material for the island's forces, we luckily have some spares.

Quests.name: Return to Henry Bloodthorn
Quests.shortDesc: Please return my payment to Henry himself, it's all there, don't worry!
Quests.longDesc: I've waited for these supplies for a long time, it's good to see that the mainland has not forgotten us completely. Bring Henry's payment to him, thanks.

Quests.name: Alarming News
Quests.shortDesc: We have some important information for Sergeant Harold, please deliver this letter to him.
Quests.longDesc: We might have some more clues regarding this mysterious magical barrier, Sergeant Harold would want to hear of this. He'll notify the king as well, if it is of enough importance of course.

Quests.name: Ancient Sorcery
Quests.shortDesc: We require some ingredients for some particularly powerful potions.
Quests.longDesc: Potions can be the difference between life and death, the Chantry values the use of potions above all. We need you to fetch the listed ingredients so that we can craft some more potions. You will be well compensated!

Quests.name: Chicken Escape!
Quests.shortDesc: My chicken is lost, I fear the bandits have snatched him for food! If you find my chicken, bring it back to the city, I beg you!
Quests.longDesc: My chicken got lost as we were returning to the castle, we were checking on the crops you see. The bandits were everywhere, so I ran all I could! You might need a key to rescue my chicken, any of the bandits could have the key!

Quests.name: Vicious Rebels
Quests.shortDesc: Angry villagers are attacking the city regularly, if you encounter any of these rebels we'd like if you'd defend the city with us!
Quests.longDesc: The increasing tension between Lightfall and the rest of Arngor is taking its toll on local tradesmen, businessmen, farmers and what not! Sadly some have turned to violence, and it must stop!

Quests.name: Guild Imposters
Quests.shortDesc: Nowadays there are far too many blades for hire, the bandits roaming the countryside are not honourable! They either join our cause, or preish! Bring me their heads, and the guild will be most grateful!
Quests.longDesc: Bandit imposters are many, we as a guild strive to build a solid and feared presence in the kingdom of Arngor. We always accept in new members, but these lone wolves will have to be dealt with. They either join the guild, or find some other field of work! We've given them enough chances as is, bring me their heads!

Quests.name: Purge the Filth
Quests.shortDesc: Our city sewers have been infested by rats, why don't you make yourself useful and do something about it?
Quests.longDesc: The city sewers are flooded with these damn rats, and they are pretty big too! You need a properly sharpened blade to put them down for sure. Just don't catch any diseases, otherwise you'll experience my bad side.

Quests.name: Corrupted Spider Venom
Quests.shortDesc: Hail, The Chantry requires your aid in obtaining corrupted spider venom, perhaps with this substance we can finally produce a potion strong enough to weaken our foes.
Quests.longDesc: Spiders found in the Cavern of Torment have been corrupted by Mol'Baragh, perhaps we can use this to our advantage? Try to extract some of the spider's venom, it would be great research for us!

Quests.name: The Power of Chaos
Quests.shortDesc: Mol'Baragh's and his minions are drawing their power through an essence of chaotic energy, please help us retrieve these essences!
Quests.longDesc: Essence of Chaos, a forbidden source of power is being used by the dark priestess to enhance her army! It seems like the crystals of power in the cave are being used to create this powerful essence. Please retrieve a sample for us, we have to know what we are up against!

Quests.name: More Essences of Chaos
Quests.shortDesc: These essences seem very useful to us, would you mind fetching us another one?
Quests.longDesc: We wish to increase our supply of these powerful essences, perhaps we can use them to break the magical barrier preventing us from venturing to Scorchridge!

Quests.name: A Returning Evil
Quests.shortDesc: Mol'Baragh has found refuge deep in the mines of Lightfall, we need you to vanquish this evil at once!
Quests.longDesc: Our mines have unfortunately been infiltrated by a major benefactor of the dark priestess, Mol'Baragh, who seek to extract powerful artifacts from our mine. We believe it is only a matter of time before he fulfill his goal, thus it is crucial that you neutralize him and his minions immediatelly!

Quests.name: Purging the Tormented
Quests.shortDesc: We require your aid to vanquish Mol'Baragh's tormentors, these lost souls have my permission to die.
Quests.longDesc: Mol'Baragh has gained a large following in our lands, people I would once call my countrymen have turned to the temptation of unimaginable power, we are obliged to bring them to justice, and we will, with no mercy!

Quests.name: Blood Brothers
Quests.shortDesc: Victus - my oldest brother has eluded me for the last time! This time I cannot forgive his actions, will you help me?
Quests.longDesc: Rumors have been spreading that my lost brother Victus has been running vile business in the nearby mines. He has dishonored the entire guild, citizens of Lightfall have been submitted to a malice I yet have to understand!   Please, help me bring him to justice - thus restoring our honor! I will be in your debt, traveler.

Quests.name: Blood Oath - Victus
Quests.shortDesc: Aye, traveler, my brother's demise was inevitable... I would like to repay your service by crafting his armor for you - thus a small fragment of his soul would live on.
Quests.longDesc: Victus was a revered armorer, crafting his magnificent armor will require several items - my colleague will assemble the armor for you when you retrieve the necessary pieces. As for the chest piece, you will have to prove your full allegiance to obtain it.

Quests.name: Malicious Sorcery
Quests.shortDesc: You will have to strengthen yourself, if you provide us with certain items you might just stand a chance. Are you interested?
Quests.longDesc: Venture to the Outskirts Catacombs and retrieve Moroes's dark essence, combine this with the ritualistic mask found within Cavern of Torment, finally infuse this with multiple essence of chaos. That should be enough to enhance the Magister's Hood further, you will have to prove your alleigance to us first, however, if you wish to obtain the hood.

Quests.name: Exchange Mantle of Protection
Quests.shortDesc: Would you like to exchange this cloak for another?
Quests.longDesc: You will need to provide me with an Essence of Chaos first!

Quests.name: Exchange Mantle of Wisdom
Quests.shortDesc: Would you like to exchange this cloak for another?
Quests.longDesc: You will need to provide me with an Essence of Chaos first!

Quests.name: Exchange Mantle of Dexterity
Quests.shortDesc: Would you like to exchange this cloak for another?
Quests.longDesc: You will need to provide me with an Essence of Chaos first!

Quests.name: Exchange Mantle of Strength
Quests.shortDesc: Would you like to exchange this cloak for another?
Quests.longDesc: You will need to provide me with an Essence of Chaos first!

Items.name: Ring of Five
Items.desc: Once wielded by a great sorcerer...

Items.name: Heartbleed
Items.desc: The spikes hold the memories of their past victims...

Items.name: Mystics of the Wild
Items.desc: Heavy of knowledge, filled with secrets.

Items.name: Shield of Vengeance
Items.desc: Lightfall's reward for its bravest soldiers.

Items.name: Helm of Shadows
Items.desc: The mark of Keldroth has been engraved into its base.

Items.name: Vial of Demonic Rat Blood
Items.desc: An essence of evil spires within...

Items.name: Rusty Key
Items.desc: Perhaps this key can be used to free Harold?

Items.name: Token of Dread
Items.desc: This item surges with dark magic...

Items.name: Small Key
Items.desc: Should be able to fit into smaller cages...

Items.name: Elixir of Berserking
Items.desc: If this isn't Ogre enough, then what is?

NPCs.name: Mayor Rorin
NPCs.desc: An elected official of Lightfall who organizes the island.

NPCs.name: Thor Heinberg
NPCs.desc: A local blacksmith and weapons crafter, master Heinberg.

NPCs.name: Lord Warren
NPCs.desc: A holy disciple from the Chantry.

NPCs.name: Slave
NPCs.desc: A slave, abused by the smugglers.

NPCs.name: Chef Pamsey
NPCs.desc: A local chef with surprising reputation.

NPCs.name: Commander Goran
NPCs.desc: A young talented warrior, whose ambitions outlast the empire.

NPCs.name: Lord Vael
NPCs.desc: A major consolidator from the Chantry.

NPCs.name: Sergeant Harold
NPCs.desc: Manages strategic operations throughout the land.

NPCs.name: Stable Master Allan
NPCs.desc: Handles the horses in the region.

NPCs.name: Dagon the Wise
NPCs.desc: A high ranking member of the Smuggler's Guild.

NPCs.name: Scout Trevor
NPCs.desc: A scout stationed at a major outpost.

Spells.name: Mortal Strike
Spells.desc: Strike your enemy with a deadly stab.

Spells.name: Crushing Blow
Spells.desc: Slam your foes with a powerful smash.

Spells.name: Arcane Blast
Spells.desc: Generates a blast dealing AOE damage.

Spells.name: Fireball
Spells.desc: Hurl a blazing bolt at your enemy.

Spells.name: Healing Circle
Spells.desc: Spawns a healing circle which will heal your allies!

Spells.name: Taunt
Spells.desc: Forces nearby enemies to attack you instead of your allies.

Spells.name: Shield Slam
Spells.desc: Strike your opponent with your shield, gaining extra threat in the act.

Spells.name: Shadow Circle
Spells.desc: Spawn a dark circle of shadows. Enemies will scream in agony.

Spells.name: Healing Touch
Spells.desc: Replenishes your or an allys health.

Spells.name: Blackhand
Spells.desc: Slam your enemy to the ground.

Spells.name: Fiery Arrow
Spells.desc: Ejects a fiery arrow towards your opponent.

Spells.name: Frostbolt
Spells.desc: Hurl a bolt of ice towards your enemy.

Spells.name: Healing Burst
Spells.desc: Heal everyone within a certain radius.

Spells.name: Impale
Spells.desc: Potentially knockdown your opponent.

Spells.name: Arcane Bolt
Spells.desc: Hurl an arcane infused bolt towards your enemy, explodes on impact.

Spells.name: Illumination
Spells.desc: Illuminate your surroundings, lasts until death, activate again to disable.

Spells.name: Fireblast
Spells.desc: An instant blast of fire.

Spells.name: Paralyze
Spells.desc: Slow down your opponent.

Spells.name: Piercing Shot
Spells.desc: Crushes through 100% of the opponents armor.

Spells.name: Explosive Shot
Spells.desc: Fires an explosive arrow towards your opponent.

Factions.name: Lightfall
Factions.desc: Lightfall has been the centre of Arngor since the beginning of time. Powerful figures have risen and fallen.

Factions.name: The Chantry
Factions.desc: Their devotion for their holy lord has spread throughout Arngor. They try to see the best in people, and fight for justice, honor, and prosperity.

Factions.name: Shadow Council
Factions.desc: A vast group of powerful necromancers, empowered by the dark priestess herself. Together they have reigned havoc on Arngor, smiting down enemies of all races.

Factions.name: Smuggler's Guild
Factions.desc: A brotherhood of thieves, loyal to the highest bidder.
